title: News24.com | Lockdown | 'Yesterday I only ate plain pap' - foreign nationals living in Diepsloot struggle financially
description: Some foreign nationals living in Diepsloot, Johannesburg, say they wish they had gone home before the national lockdown kicked in.
content:
Some foreign nationals living in Diepsloot, Johannesburg, say they wish they had gone home before the national lockdown kicked in. 
Samuel Sibanda from Mozambique said he arrived in the country six years ago seeking employment.
He now regrets not going home… [+2998 chars]
